## fieldRegistry namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [register(type, fieldClass)](./blockly.fieldregistry.register.md) | Registers a field type. fieldRegistry.fromJson uses this registry to find the appropriate field type. |
|  [unregister(type)](./blockly.fieldregistry.unregister.md) | Unregisters the field registered with the given type. |
